controller

Class RobotClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.RobotClient

  • public class RobotClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Class wich allows to connect to the robot by using a socket connection (Get,Send data,connect,disconnect...)
    Author:
    Valentin

      • openConnection

        public void openConnection(java.lang.String p_robotIP,
                           int p_robotPort)
        Open a socket connection with the robot to get the transmitted data
        Parameters:
        p_robotIP - Address IP to connect to the robot
        p_robotPort - Port to open the connection

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection()
        Close the connection open by the openConnection method and reset the BufferedReader and printWriter

      • send

        public void send(java.lang.String p_message)
        Send a command to the robot
        Parameters:
        p_message - The command to send to the robot (automatically ended by a break line)
